title: Unlimited Money Is NOT the Answer | Guest: Steve Deace | 3/23/20
description:
While America is self-quarantining, millions of truckers are working overtime to keep us fed. The Senate Republicans’ massive stimulus bill failed to pass, as Sen. Rand Paul tests positive for COVID-19 and Nancy Pelosi promises a larger Democrat-led bill. And for some reason, people are still worried about climate change! The Federal Reserve is giving modern monetary theory a whirl and buying up stocks. President Trump activated the National Guard but refuses to nationalize businesses as companies volunteer to help. But rumors of martial law are just that – rumors! Today’s coronavirus update isn’t all bad news. Glenn brings stories of Americans coming together! BlazeTV host Steve Deace joins to discuss his new op-ed and whether the cure is worse than the disease.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
